short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides alerts and tools for Warframe.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Warframe Helper is a simple extension that keeps you up to date on the latest Warframe data (alerts, invasions, sorties, fissures, deals, traders. etc.), complete with customizable desktop notifications, PC/PS4/XB1 support, and a quick Wikia search feature.
